summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4582 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South, from Orcas Street to Brandon Street; by the construction of concrete walks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53463, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
